name: Grand Blue: A Typical Fantasy
description:
Hi there!

Not much to do or see here yet. I'm working solo on a JRPG, nothing fancy. I use RPG Maker MZ for this, progress is slow but steady.

The goal of this project is to see it through to the end, however long it may take. To deliver a game, undefined in length/playtime, that is at least mildly enjoyable.

I already wish to credit:
Moghunter
VisuStella
For the great JS scripts they provide.

Visuals are not final, roadmap is as follows:

So good luck to me! More news soon!

Greetings,
NoobySnax
